mapper.select: SELECT a.INTERVIEW_TYPE, a.INTERVIEW_SEQ , a.INTERVIEW_TITLE, a.INTERVIEW_TIME, a.INTERVIEW_STATUS, a.INTERVIEW_DD FROM INTERVIEW A WHERE a.ADMISSION_ID = #{admissionId} AND a.INTERVIEW_DD = #{requestDate}
SELECT a.INTERVIEW_TYPE, a.INTERVIEW_SEQ , a.INTERVIEW_TITLE, a.INTERVIEW_TIME, a.INTERVIEW_STATUS, a.INTERVIEW_DD FROM INTERVIEW A WHERE a.ADMISSION_ID = #{admissionId}

SELECT b.INTERVIEW_TYPE ,c.SYMPTOM_TITLE FROM INTERVIEW_DETAIL a INNER JOIN INTERVIEW_RISK c ON a.ANSWER_SEQ = c.INTERVIEW_SEQ INNER JOIN interview b ON b.INTERVIEW_SEQ = a.INTERVIEW_SEQ WHERE a.INTERVIEW_SEQ = #{id};

SELECT B.INTER_SEQ , B.INTER_CATEGORI , B.INTER_NO , B.INTER_CONTENT , B.INTER_TYPE , B.INTER_ORDER , B.INTERVIEW_TYPE , B.REG_ID , B.REG_DT , B.VAL01 , B.VAL02 , B.VAL03 , B.VAL04 , B.VAL05 , B.VAL06 , B.VAL07 , B.VAL08 , B.VAL09 , B.VAL10 , B.VAL11 , B.VAL12
FROM INTERVIEW_CONTENT B WHERE B.INTERVIEW_TYPE = #{interviewType}
SELECT INTERVIEW_SEQ ,INTERVIEW_DETAIL_SEQ ,ANSWER_SEQ ,ANSWER_VALUE FROM INTERVIEW_DETAIL WHERE INTERVIEW_SEQ = #{interviewSeq} AND ANSWER_SEQ =#{answerSeq}
